quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: I was the top looper on the island. No one could beat me.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: You're thinking, "You fell into a volcano and your head caught fire?"

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: I had built the tallest stairway ever and I had this guy right in my sights.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: Down I went when suddenly--BLINK--I was IN the volcano. Merged.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: Next loop, the island was different. And the volcano was no more.

quests.shortDescription: I'm detecting some unusual biochemical energy... - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I'll be honest: I'm suspicious of the tree.  - The Scientist

quests.name: Scan the Reality Tree
quests.shortDescription: Are all of these new plants coming from the Reality Tree?  - The Scientist

quests.name: Scan the root between the Reality Tree and the Reality Bloom
quests.description: Scan the root between the Reality Tree and the Reality Bloom
quests.shortDescription: I don't like the look of these roots...  - The Scientist

quests.name: Scan the Reality Bloom
quests.shortDescription: You can see that bloom too, right?  - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: It's time for some horrifying horticulture.  - The Scientist

quests.name: Harvest Fruit from Reality Saplings
quests.shortDescription: Weeds prevent a Reality Tree from producing fruit. - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I've found a brave volunteer to sacrifice his body in the name of science.  - The Scientist

quests.name: Acquire Bushranger seed from mysterious bloom and bring it to the Reality Tree
quests.description: Acquire Bushranger seed from mysterious bloom and bring it to the Reality Tree
quests.shortDescription: Bushranger, meet big scary tree. Big scary tree, this is Bushranger.  - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: We need to talk.  - The Scientist

quests.name: Interact with Zero Point Scanning Devices
quests.description: Interact with Zero Point Scanning Devices
quests.shortDescription: This analysis is looking grim. Maybe it'll improve with more data...  - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I know how much you love weapons testing... - The Scientist

quests.name: Damage opponents using a Star Wars Weapon
quests.description: Damage opponents using a Star Wars Weapon
quests.shortDescription: Show me how to handle this thing. - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: Eavesdropping is bad. Except when it's necessary. - The Scientist

quests.name: Plant Listening Devices at Imperial Docking Bays
quests.description: Plant Listening Devices at Imperial Docking Bays
quests.shortDescription: Those Stormtroopers are up to something. - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: The Scientist sent me. Don't you love the Scientist? - AMIE

quests.name: Defeat Darth Vader
quests.shortDescription: Defeat Darth Vader! I'll watch. - AMIE

quests.name: All Washed Up
quests.shortDescription: We need to track down that Relic. - The Scientist

quests.name: All Washed Up
quests.description: Visit Beach Bash where the Sith Holocron washed up
quests.shortDescription: I've found the Relic, but you'll have to pick it up for me. - The Scientist

quests.name: All Washed Up
quests.description: Investigate clues to the whereabouts of the Sith Holocron
quests.shortDescription: We need that Relic. Start looking for clues! - The Scientist

quests.name: Collect Anomalies
quests.shortDescription: We've been tasked with setting up a trade. - AMIE

quests.name: Collect Anomalies
quests.description: Collect an anomaly from both LogJam Junction and Neo Butter Barn
quests.shortDescription: Find something interesting to trade Cryptic for the Relic! - AMIE

quests.name: Counterfeit
quests.shortDescription: Cryptic will FEEL MY CYBER-WRATH! - AMIE

quests.name: Counterfeit
quests.description: Collect a tracking device from Synapse Station
quests.shortDescription: We will find Cryptic. And he will find PAIN. - AMIE

quests.name: Counterfeit
quests.description: Dumpster dive for fake relic materials
quests.shortDescription: Turn this trash into valuable, Cryptic-tricking possessions.- AMIE

quests.name: Counterfeit
quests.description: Construct a fake relic at Sunken Suburbs
quests.shortDescription: We must bait the horrible Roller Coaster Man. - AMIE

quests.name: The Heist
quests.shortDescription: It is time to PUNISH Cryptic and collect the Relic. But mostly PUNISH CRYPTIC. - AMIE

quests.name: The Heist
quests.description: Locate where the Sith Holocron is being held in Rave Cave
quests.shortDescription: The Relic should be located... Here. - AMIE

quests.name: The Heist
quests.description: Pry open shipping boxes to find the Sith Holocron
quests.shortDescription: Find the Relic for the Scientist! - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I found our next Relic... But it's in pieces. - The Scientist

quests.name: Dig up dirt piles to find the Relic Shard
quests.description: Dig up dirt piles to find the Relic Shard
quests.shortDescription: I don't know what I'll do if we don't find the Relic Shard... Explode, maybe? - AMIE

quests.name: Attune the Relic Shard
quests.shortDescription: I'm so excited I might explode anyways! - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I found the other Relic Shard! The Scientist will be so happy... - AMIE

quests.name: Unclog the main pipe to free the Relic Shard
quests.description: Unclog the main pipe to free the Relic Shard
quests.shortDescription: The Relic Shard is stuck in those pipes. Initiate plumbing protocol... - AMIE

quests.name: Unclog the main pipe to free the Relic Shard
quests.description: Unclog the main pipe to free the Relic Shard
quests.shortDescription: The Relic Shard is stuck in those pipes. Initiate plumbing protocol... - AMIE

quests.name: Attune the Relic Shard
quests.shortDescription: Get that shard attuned! And receive praise!! - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: The final Relic Shard must be attuned! Hurry! - AMIE

quests.name: Align the three mirrors
quests.shortDescription: It's a mirror trick! The Scientist LOVES mirrors. - AMIE

quests.name: Collect and attune the Relic Shard
quests.description: Collect and attune the Relic Shard
quests.shortDescription: It's our last Shard to attune! Aren't you thrilled?! I'M THRILLED!! - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: It's time to reassemble the Relic. I have no idea what'll happen so... You do it. - The Scientist

quests.name: Combine the Relic Shards in the main chamber at Shuffled Shrines
quests.description: Combine the Relic Shards in the main chamber at Shuffled Shrines
quests.shortDescription: Revisiting the previous relic spots might give clues on how to enter the main chamber - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: We've got a lead on another Relic. - The Scientist

quests.name: Find The Chair
quests.shortDescription: I always knew something was up with that Chair... - The Scientist

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I know what will break this shield... Brute force! - AMIE

quests.name: Travel distance while Sprinting
quests.shortDescription: Prove your speed on those fleshy little legs! - AMIE

quests.name: Consume Foraged Items
quests.shortDescription: Only the strongest of gut can handle the Island's exotic mushrooms... - AMIE

quests.name: Travel distance while swimming
quests.shortDescription: A strong swimmer could break this Relic Shield with a single doggie paddle... - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: I think we're ready for operation shield break. - AMIE

quests.name: Break energy field around The Chair
quests.description: Break energy field around The Chair
quests.shortDescription: It's time to break this shield! FOR THE SCIENTIST! - AMIE

quests.name: Collect The Chair
quests.shortDescription: That Chair is ours for the taking, and yours for the sitting. - AMIE

quests.name: Find the Foundation
quests.shortDescription: AMIE tells me you need my help. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Foundation
quests.description: Collect the Foundation's launch records at Sanctuary
quests.shortDescription: We need to search the launch records for Foundation's destination. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Foundation
quests.description: Report to the Foundation at Mighty Monument
quests.shortDescription: Is the Foundation at Mighty Monument? - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Foundation
quests.description: Find a clue for the Foundation's whereabouts
quests.shortDescription: The Foundation appears to be missing. I don't like this... - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Visitor
quests.shortDescription: Foundation is still MIA. We need to do a headcount. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Visitor
quests.shortDescription: Track down the Visitor at his last known location. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Visitor
quests.description: Collect surveillance footage from cameras at Bungalow Blooms
quests.shortDescription: Those security cameras must have recorded where the Visitor went... - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Imagined
quests.shortDescription: We need to talk about the Imagined. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Imagined
quests.description: Dance on the main dance floor at Rave Cave for 5 seconds
quests.shortDescription: If the Imagined is still on the Island. she'll be at the Rave Cave. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Imagined
quests.description: Restore Health or Shields by destroying Slurp Barrels in Rave Cave
quests.shortDescription: Maybe the Imagined is stocking up on Slurp? - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Imagined
quests.description: Find a clue for the Imagined's whereabouts
quests.shortDescription: There's no sign of her. Imagined, where did you go? - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Order
quests.shortDescription: We're either delivering bad news... Or discovering even worse news. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Order
quests.shortDescription: If the Order's there, tell her about the Imagined. If she's not... Well... - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Order
quests.shortDescription: If the Order's there, tell her about the Imagined. If she's not... Well... - The Paradigm

quests.name: Find the Order
quests.description: Find a clue for the Order's whereabouts
quests.shortDescription: The Order can't be gone. She has to be here somewhere. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: WE HAVE TO FIND THE SCIENTIST!!! - AMIE

quests.name: Find The Seven comm device
quests.shortDescription: If you can find the comms device, I'll call the Scientist on his PERSONAL number. - AMIE

quests.name: Swim through energy clouds to charge the energy cell
quests.description: Swim through energy clouds to charge the energy cell
quests.shortDescription: Charge it using the water's energy clouds. And maybe put it in some rice after. - AMIE

quests.name: Plug the energy cell back into The Seven comm device
quests.description: Plug the energy cell back into The Seven comm device
quests.shortDescription: Quick! Plug the energy cell back into the device. I NEED to call the Scientist! - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: Call off the cavalry. I've found them. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Visit Coney Crossroads
quests.shortDescription: We should scrounge up as much Seven tech as we can. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Visit Lazy Lagoon
quests.shortDescription: This supply cache looks cleaned out. Let's check the next one. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Collect The Origin Helmet at Seven Outpost III
quests.description: Collect The Origin Helmet at Seven Outpost III
quests.shortDescription: Okay, we should at LEAST be able to find the Origin's missing helmet. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: Mayday! Mayday! - The Paradigm

quests.name: Visit Synapse Station
quests.shortDescription: Get to Synapse. We need the Scientist's notes NOW. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Collect notes
quests.shortDescription: Check those papers! We're looking for lab reports. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Interact with the terminal
quests.shortDescription: Download EVERYTHING from that terminal. - The Paradigm

quests.name: Interact with The Scientist's audio log
quests.description: Interact with The Scientist's audio log
quests.shortDescription: Is that an audiolog? From the Scientist? - AMIE

quests.name: Establish Device Uplink
quests.shortDescription: Huh. The Paradigm's gone. Do you think she's with the Scientist? - AMIE

quests.name: Interact with the Recording of Paradigm's disappearance
quests.description: Interact with the Recording of Paradigm's disappearance
quests.shortDescription: This tape might tell us where the Scientist went!! Uh, the Paradigm. I meant the Paradigm. - AMIE

quests.description: Emote at different promotional dance floor locations

quests.description: Destroy large sea buoys with Motorboat Missiles

quests.description: Remove No Sweat signs from recalled products
quests.shortDescription: We're tactically abandoning this sponsorship for classified reasons.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: So... Wanna hear about how I fixed my possessed sword?

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: The demon living in my sword was being a real jerk. Relatable, I know.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: That's when the snake came into play. The Sapphire Serpent of legend.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: So I found the snake. Wrapped the blade in shed skin. And re-forged it.

quests.name: Complete Daily Bonus Goals
quests.shortDescription: As you can tell, it all worked out. And I'm kinda into the new look.
